TextView.android:text: Kindly note that rental filing has been simplified. Log in to your itax profile using PIN and password, click on returns, file returns, select obligation (income tax-rent income), fill the details and submit Deadline for Filing PAYE is 9th and Penalty is Kshs 10,000 While VAT and Rental is 20th of every Month and Penalties are Kshs 10,000 and Kshs 2,000 Respectively

Kindly log in to itax using your PIN and password, click on the Return Tab and select File Return option. Select the tax obligation as Income Tax - VAT then click on next. · There will be a list of steps to follow. Under number five click on 'Click Here' to download file. - Enable the macros, save the file as excel macro enabled workbook, close it and re-open from the location it has been saved. · Under Section A Basic Information, fill in with your PIN, period ant type of return as original. · Fill the excel form appropriately. · Once you have completed filing the form click on 'VALIDATE' at the end of the O_VAT due work sheet. Once the form validates it will save itself under ‘My Documents’. You will go back to your itax profile and upload the zip file.
